Package Manager

Class ReservationMgr

java.lang.Object
Manager.ReservationMgr
public class ReservationMgr extends Object
Represents the class which manages anything related to the reservations in the restaurant.
Since:
2021-11-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Shannen Lee

    • readReservation

      public static ArrayList<Reservation> readReservation()
      Reads the reservations from the Reservation.txt file.
      Returns:
      ArrayList

    • checkReservationExpiry

      public static void checkReservationExpiry()
      Checks the expired reservations by checking if it is 30 minutes past the current time.

    • addReservationBooking

      public static void addReservationBooking​(Reservation r1)
      Adds reservation bookings into the array list r.
      Parameters:
      r1 - The reservation that will be added into the array list of reservations

    • removeReservationBooking

      public static void removeReservationBooking​(int number)
      Removes the reservation booking with the specific customer contact number from the array list of reservations.
      Parameters:
      number - The customer contact of the reservation which will be removed from the array list.

    • checkReservationBooking

      public static void checkReservationBooking​(int number)
      Checks the reservation booking with the specific customer contact number from the array list of reservations. If it is valid, the reservation details will be printed. If it is not valid, it will print that the reservation does not exist.
      Parameters:
      number - The customer contact of the reservation which will be checked with the array list.

    • displayReservation

      public static void displayReservation() throws FileNotFoundException
      Displays the current reservations and the reservation details
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException
